page.title: 13EVENTS "LINK ALIVE"
page.content: "Link Alive" The "Link Alive" festival was held this year from 6th July -14th July. The idea was that the whole community met and enjoyed itself.Events included a buffet and cabaret, songs of Praise,an organ recital,a schools' concert, a missionary talk and film show, a fun day and a crafts and hobbies exhibition, a pop concert and a waok to Malvern Priory. The schools who took part in the concert were Dyson Perrins C.E.High school,Malvern Link C.E.School, Malvern Link Junior School (Somers Park), Cowleigh C.E.School, Hillside School and The Grove School.
